wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Jones (born 5 March 1987) is a British acrobatic gymnast that represented Great Britain, achieving a bronze medal in the men's pairs discipline at the World Games in 2005, and a further bronze at the European Acrobatic Gymmnastics Championships, both in partnership with Mark Fyson.

#REDIRECT Chris Jones (gymnast)

Mark Fyson (born 21 August 1981) is a British acrobatic gymnast competing at international level, winning  a bronze medal in the men's pairs discipline at the World Games in 2005, and a further bronze at the European Acrobatic Gymmnastics Championships, both in partnership with Chris Jones.
